name: Albert Solino
overview:
Albert Solino, is a global provider of specialized consulting services in the areas of Investment Solutions, Corporate Finance, IT, Management Solutions and Outsourcing Services.

The effective management and right strategy are the key elements of our success. We deliver concrete results for our customers with experienced and dynamic team of international background.

We operate globally with offices in; Turkey Germany South Korea

WHAT WE DO? 1-Management Consulting

  • Strategic Planning
  • Sales and Marketing Strategy
  • Corporate Value
  • Value Chain Analysis
  • Business Process Management
  • Legislation Advisory
  • Re-structuring services

2-Invesment Consulting

  • Advisory to Turkish Market Entrance
  • Market Research for Turkey
  • Pricing Strategy for Turkish Market
  • Merger & Acquisition
  • IPO – Initial Public Offering
  • Corporate Finance
  • Company Valuation
  • Feasibility Studies
  • Turkish Incentives Advisory 3-Technology
  • Cybernetics
  • Production Management Software
  • Real-time Monitoring Software
  • Data Acquisition Software
  • Simulation & CAD & CAE
  • IT Based Lean Manufacturing

4-Outsourcing

  • Compliance & Reporting Services
  • Business Process Outsourcing
  • Turkish Legislation Compliance Services
  • Turkish Tax System & Financial Budgeting
  • Incentives & Grants
  • Investment Project Management

offices.address1: Yeni Street VIP Plaza Number:5 Floor:7
